hero.name: Umar Farook J
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate developer with expertise in building modern web applications. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and bringing ideas to life through code.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
workExperience.description: Working as a Software Engineer, contributing to the design and development of scalable web applications. Involved in building and maintaining frontend components using React.js and backend services using modern JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features, optimize performance, and ensure clean, maintainable code following best practices.

workExperience.title: Co-founder & Product Analyst (StubLab)
workExperience.description: Co-founder and product analyst for StubLab — a mock server that allows users to create and test APIs without a backend. Implemented JWT-based authentication and additional security using MFA.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Developer (Vinculo)
workExperience.description: Contributed to developing an ecommerce website for SSM Garment using MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) technology.

projects.title: Document Scanner
projects.description: Convert images to PDF using OpenCV and tkinter. Images are filtered and cropped using corner detection and perspective transformation — designed to run in Jupyter/VSCode environments.

projects.title: College Website
projects.description: Built the college website for SSM Institute of Engineering and Technology using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap — the first project during the start of web development learning.

projects.title: Personal Travel Blog
projects.description: A travel blog showcasing travel tips, photos, featured destinations and posts. Built with responsive layout and simple CMS-ready structure.

freelanceProjects.title: SoftZCart
freelanceProjects.description: Software / ecommerce website developed using the MERN stack and hosted on a VPS (Hostinger). Features include product management, user authentication, and checkout flow.

freelanceProjects.title: Ecommerce Website for GiftieBags
freelanceProjects.description: Developed a dynamic ecommerce website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Implemented a user-friendly interface for browsing and purchasing products.

education.college: SSM Institute of Engineering and Technology, Dindigul

workshops.title: App Development Using Java and Python

certifications.title: Internship Certificate - Maxelerator Foundation
certifications.description: Completed internship in Automatic Intelligence System Using Computer Vision. Developed practical skills in AI/ML and computer vision technologies during 10-day intensive program at Maxelerator Foundation, Madurai.

achievements.title: Letter of Appreciation - MentorBridge
achievements.description: Recognized for outstanding participation in the MentorBridge internship program (Nov 2024 - May 2025). Commended for proactive approach, professionalism, innovative thinking, and demonstrating potential as a future-ready professional in product development.

achievements.title: Junior Grade Typewriting Certificate
achievements.description: Achieved First Class with Distinction in Junior Grade Typewriting English (30 Words per Minute) examination conducted by Government of Tamil Nadu, Department of Technical Education.
